page.title: 14A SHOPKEEPERS DAY.
page.content: My name is Edna.I work in a shop for a living.I have been working here for about 18 years. My shop is a Greengrocers and Off Licence. I get up at 5.30 a.m. to get ready to open the shop.By the time I get to the shop it is 8.10 a.m. Then I get the shop ready for my customers.I have no assistants to help me .I sometimes stop to have a chat with my customers. My busiest day is either Thursdays or Fridays.I do not work on Sundays.I work eleven and a half hours a day.Every day I open at 8.30 a.m. and close at 8.00 p.m. I read a book when I haven't got any customers.
